thread.title: Axar Capital Management Takes a Stake in a Real Estate Debt Firm

author: Peter Grant
title: Axar Capital Management Takes a Stake in a Real Estate Debt Firm
text:
A provider of junior debt in the real-estate industry is taking on a new partner in anticipation of what the firmâ€™s co-founder expects will be a shakeout in the business.
Axar Capital Management LP, a hedge fund and investment manager, has acquired a stake in Terra Capital Partners, which has provided debt financing to more than 300 properties over its 15-year history, according to Co-Founder and Chief Executive Bruce Batkin. Terra currently has about $450 million of assets under management.
